languages.text: "Однако сенешаль не оценил стараний и почему-то назвал мои действия безобразием. Хотя за несколько дней до этого беспричинно кутал меня в тепло-желтые речи — я заметила, ваши люди так делают, когда выражают другим свою симпатию. И лишь хотела отплатить сенешалю тем же. Возможно, мое дружелюбие ему претит?"

traits.locale_text: "Однако Сенешаль не оценил стараний и почему-то назвал мои действия безобразием. Хотя за несколько дней до этого беспричинно кутал меня в тепло-желтые речи — я заметила, ваши люди так делают, когда выражают другим свою симпатию. И лишь хотела отплатить сенешалю тем же. Возможно, мое дружелюбие ему претит?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "And yet the Seneschal did not appreciate my efforts and for some reason called them an outrage. Even though mere days before he had been swaddling me in warm yellow words — I noticed all your people do this when they are expressing sympathy. I merely wanted to repay the Seneschal with the same courtesy. Perhaps he finds my friendliness off-putting?"
languages.original_text: "Однако сенешаль не оценил стараний и почему-то назвал мои действия безобразием. Хотя за несколько дней до этого беспричинно кутал меня в тепло-желтые речи — я заметила, ваши люди так делают, когда выражают другим свою симпатию. И лишь хотела отплатить сенешалю тем же. Возможно, мое дружелюбие ему претит?"

traits.locale_text: "And yet the Seneschal did not appreciate my efforts and for some reason called them an outrage. Even though he was swaddling me in warm yellow words just a few days before — I noticed all of your people do this when they are expressing sympathy. I merely wanted to pay the Seneschal back with the same courtesy. Perhaps my friendliness is off-putting to him?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And yet the Seneschal did not appreciate my efforts and for some reason called them an outrage. Even though he was swaddling me in warm yellow words just a few days before — I noticed all of your people do this when they are expressing sympathy. I merely wanted to pay the Seneschal back with the same courtesy. Perhaps my friendliness is off-putting to him?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And yet the Seneschal did not appreciate my efforts and for some reason called them an outrage. Even though mere days before he had been swaddling me in warm yellow words — I noticed all your people do this when they are expressing sympathy. I merely wanted to repay the Seneschal with the same courtesy. Perhaps he finds my friendliness off-putting?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And yet the Seneschal did not appreciate my efforts and for some reason called them an outrage. Even though mere days before he had been swaddling me in warm yellow words — I noticed all your people do this when they are expressing sympathy. I merely wanted to repay the Seneschal with the same courtesy. Perhaps he finds my friendliness off-putting?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And yet the Seneschal did not appreciate my efforts and for some reason called them an outrage. Even though mere days before he had been swaddling me in warm yellow words — I noticed all your people do this when they are expressing sympathy. I merely wanted to repay the Seneschal with the same courtesy. Perhaps he finds my friendliness off-putting?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “然而，总领并不欣赏我的努力。出于某种原因，他还说这种行为令人愤慨。就在几天之前，他还用温暖的黄色话语对我说过话。我注意到，你们所有人在表达同情的时候，都会这么做。我仅仅是想以同样的礼节回报总领而已，或许他觉得我的友善态度令他感到不满？”
languages.original_text: "And yet the Seneschal did not appreciate my efforts and for some reason called them an outrage. Even though mere days before he had been swaddling me in warm yellow words — I noticed all your people do this when they are expressing sympathy. I merely wanted to repay the Seneschal with the same courtesy. Perhaps he finds my friendliness off-putting?"

traits.locale_text: “然而，总领并不欣赏我的努力。出于某种原因，他还说这种行为令人愤慨。就在几天之前，他还用温暖的黄色话语对我说过话。我注意到，你们所有人在表达同情的时候，都会这么做。我仅仅是想以同样的礼节回报总领而已，或许他觉得我的友善态度令他感到不满？”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Y sin embargo el Senescal no supo valorar mis esfuerzos y afirmó que eran un ultraje. Y eso que un par de días antes me había estado rodeando de cálidas palabras amarillas... me he fijado en que toda su gente hace eso al expresar sus simpatías. Solo quería devolverle el favor al Senescal. ¿Cree que mi amabilidad le resulta engorrosa?».
languages.original_text: "And yet the Seneschal did not appreciate my efforts and for some reason called them an outrage. Even though mere days before he had been swaddling me in warm yellow words — I noticed all your people do this when they are expressing sympathy. I merely wanted to repay the Seneschal with the same courtesy. Perhaps he finds my friendliness off-putting?"

traits.locale_text: «Y sin embargo el Senescal no supo valorar mis esfuerzos y afirmó que eran un ultraje. Y eso que un par de días antes me había estado rodeando de cálidas palabras amarillas... me he fijado en que toda su gente hace eso al expresar sus simpatías. Solo quería devolverle el favor al Senescal. ¿Cree que mi amabilidad le resulta engorrosa?».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「それなのに、家令長さんはあたくしの努力を認めず、なぜか暴挙だと仰ったのです。ほんの数日前まで、彼はあたくしを温かい黄色い言葉で包んでくれていたのに…{name}様の従者は皆、同情を示すときにそうするのだと気が付きました。あたくしはただ、家令長さんに同じ礼儀を返したかっただけなのです。おそらく彼は、あたくしの友好的な態度を不快に思われたのでしょう」
languages.original_text: "And yet the Seneschal did not appreciate my efforts and for some reason called them an outrage. Even though mere days before he had been swaddling me in warm yellow words — I noticed all your people do this when they are expressing sympathy. I merely wanted to repay the Seneschal with the same courtesy. Perhaps he finds my friendliness off-putting?"

traits.locale_text: 「それなのに、家令長さんはあたくしの努力を認めず、なぜか暴挙だと仰ったのです。ほんの数日前まで、彼はあたくしを温かい黄色い言葉で包んでくれていたのに…{name}様の従者は皆、同情を示すときにそうするのだと気が付きました。あたくしはただ、家令長さんに同じ礼儀を返したかっただけなのです。おそらく彼は、あたくしの友好的な態度を不快に思われたのでしょう」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Und dennoch wusste der Truchsess meine Bemühungen nicht zu würdigen und nannte sie aus irgendeinem Grund sogar einen Skandal. Dabei hatte er mich noch wenige Tage zuvor mit warmen, gelben Worten überschüttet – Euresgleichen tut das, um Sympathie auszudrücken. Ich wollte dem Truchsess lediglich dieselbe Höflichkeit erweisen. Vielleicht verstört ihn meine Freundlichkeit?"
languages.original_text: "And yet the Seneschal did not appreciate my efforts and for some reason called them an outrage. Even though mere days before he had been swaddling me in warm yellow words — I noticed all your people do this when they are expressing sympathy. I merely wanted to repay the Seneschal with the same courtesy. Perhaps he finds my friendliness off-putting?"

traits.locale_text: "Und dennoch wusste der Truchsess meine Bemühungen nicht zu würdigen und nannte sie aus irgendeinem Grund sogar einen Skandal. Dabei hatte er mich noch wenige Tage zuvor mit warmen, gelben Worten überschüttet – Euresgleichen tut das, um Sympathie auszudrücken. Ich wollte dem Truchsess lediglich dieselbe Höflichkeit erweisen. Vielleicht verstört ihn meine Freundlichkeit?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Contre toute attente, le sénéchal ne semble pas avoir apprécié mes efforts. Il est même allé jusqu'à parler d'outrage, alors que quelques jours auparavant il me couvrait de paroles réconfortantes, comme ont l'habitude de faire vos gens pour exprimer leur compassion. Tout ce que j'ai fait, c'était de lui rendre la courtoisie. Peut-être a-t-il été déstabilisé par ma bienveillance ? »
languages.original_text: "And yet the Seneschal did not appreciate my efforts and for some reason called them an outrage. Even though mere days before he had been swaddling me in warm yellow words — I noticed all your people do this when they are expressing sympathy. I merely wanted to repay the Seneschal with the same courtesy. Perhaps he finds my friendliness off-putting?"

traits.locale_text: « Contre toute attente, le sénéchal ne semble pas avoir apprécié mes efforts. Il est même allé jusqu'à parler d'outrage, alors que quelques jours auparavant il me couvrait de paroles réconfortantes, comme ont l'habitude de faire vos gens pour exprimer leur compassion. Tout ce que j'ai fait, c'était de lui rendre la courtoisie. Peut-être a-t-il été déstabilisé par ma bienveillance ? »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Seneşal ise çabalarımı takdir etmek yerine nedense onları birer rezalet olarak tanımladı. Daha birkaç gün önce beni sıcak, sarı sözcüklerle sarmalıyordu. Sizin gibilerin sempatilerini ifade etmek için bu şekilde davrandığını fark ettim. Ben de Seneşal'e aynı nezaketi göstereyim istemiştim sadece. Belki de dostane tavırlarımı rahatsız edici buluyordur?"
languages.original_text: "And yet the Seneschal did not appreciate my efforts and for some reason called them an outrage. Even though mere days before he had been swaddling me in warm yellow words — I noticed all your people do this when they are expressing sympathy. I merely wanted to repay the Seneschal with the same courtesy. Perhaps he finds my friendliness off-putting?"

traits.locale_text: "Seneşal ise çabalarımı takdir etmek yerine nedense onları birer rezalet olarak tanımladı. Daha birkaç gün önce beni sıcak, sarı sözcüklerle sarmalıyordu. Sizin gibilerin sempatilerini ifade etmek için bu şekilde davrandığını fark ettim. Ben de Seneşal'e aynı nezaketi göstereyim istemiştim sadece. Belki de dostane tavırlarımı rahatsız edici buluyordur?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
